Class World

java.lang.Object
  World

public class World
extends java.lang.Object

Represents the entire game world. (Designed to be instantiated just once for the whole game).

update

public void update(double dir_x,
                   double dir_y,
                   int delta)
            throws org.newdawn.slick.SlickException
Update the game state for a frame.

Parameters:
dir_x - The player's movement in the x axis (-1, 0 or 1).
dir_y - The player's movement in the y axis (-1, 0 or 1).
delta - Time passed since last frame (milliseconds).
Throws:
org.newdawn.slick.SlickException

block

public boolean block(int x,
                     int y)
using to judge whether the next tile could move in

Parameters:
x - the next x-position that player will move to
y - the next y-position that player will move to
Returns:
true if next tile is blocked
